title: Strange pixels near AtPeace fixed
message:
Strange pixels near AtPeace fixed

Fixes #14
Issue reported on CM 10.2 / Android 4.3.1.
Issue is related to android:shadowRadius. Fixed by added paddingRight,
but can also be fixed by setting parent's width (inPeaceTextCurrent) to
match_parent.

title: New version release
message:
New version release

versionCode=6 versionName=0.9.4 beta
Deep-sleep bug fixed

title: Fixes #6
message:
Fixes #6

Replaced initial broadcast by a wakeup alarm for the end sent to the
broadcast receiver. The UI is updated using a Handler/Runnable. Widget
is updated using a non wakeup alarm through the broadcast receiver.
Added a second lo-res video using H.264 for some devices

title: Added real TargetTime
message:
Added real TargetTime

Handler/Runnable to update UI instead of tick in broadcast
Replaced repeatingAlarm by single wakeup alarm

title: New version release
message:
New version release

versionCode=4 versionName=0.9.2 beta

title: Updated video format
message:
Updated video format

libx264 H.264 could not play on some devices. reverting to MPEG-4 part2
avconv -i fp_start_pom_video_orig.mp4
    -c:v mpeg4
    -an
    -s 540x960
    -aspect 9:16
    -r 24
    -b 256k
    -q:v 1
    fp_start_pom_video.mp4

message:
handling alarm inaccuracy

optimized broadcast/receiver
cleanup and refactoring

title: repeating alarm fix
message:
repeating alarm fix

Remove repeating alarm if PeaceOfMind is off (bug from Kwamecorp
original version)
AirplaneMode extends SilentMode, to add more tranquility
Removed broadcast for SilentMode (listener is called by system). This is
differs from AirplaneMode which does need a manual broadcast
Widget colors fix
Cleanup

title: Updated video format
message:
Updated video format

avconv -i fp_start_pom_video_orig.mp4
-c:v libx264
-an
-s 540x960
-aspect 9:16
-r 24
-b 256k
-q:v 1
fp_start_pom_video.mp4
